test_cases.name: Login with empty username and password
test_cases.description: Verify the behavior when attempting to log in with empty username and password fields.
steps: Step 1: Leave the 'Username or email address' field empty.
expected_results: Expected result 1: An error message should be displayed indicating that the username or email address is required.
Expected result 2: An error message should be displayed indicating that the password is required.

elements.description: Username or email address input field

test_cases.name: Login with email containing spaces
test_cases.description: Verify the behavior when attempting to log in with an email address containing spaces.
steps: Step 1: Enter an email address with spaces in the 'Username or email address' field.
Step 2: Enter a password in the 'Password' field.
expected_results: Expected result 1: An error message should be displayed indicating an invalid email format.

elements.description: Username or email address input field

test_cases.name: Login with extremely long email
test_cases.description: Verify the behavior when attempting to log in with an extremely long email address.
steps: Step 1: Enter a very long email address (e.g., exceeding 254 characters) in the 'Username or email address' field.
Step 2: Enter a password in the 'Password' field.
expected_results: Expected result 1: The application should either truncate the email address or display an error message indicating that the email address is too long.

elements.description: Username or email address input field

test_cases.name: Login with domain-less email
test_cases.description: Verify the behavior when attempting to log in with an email address without a domain.
steps: Step 1: Enter an email address without a domain (e.g., 'test') in the 'Username or email address' field.
Step 2: Enter a password in the 'Password' field.
expected_results: Expected result 1: An error message should be displayed indicating an invalid email format.

elements.description: Username or email address input field

test_cases.name: SQL Injection Attempt in Username Field
test_cases.description: Attempt SQL injection via the username field.
steps: Step 1: Enter a SQL injection string (e.g., "' OR '1'='1") into the 'Username or email address' field.
expected_results: Expected Result 1: The application should not log in and should ideally display a generic error message that does not reveal system information.
Expected Result 2: No database error messages should be displayed.
